title: FlexJobs Jobs Scraper
description: Scrapes job listings from FlexJobs by crawling public category and job pages. Simply provide start URLs and set your preferences.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of FlexJobs category or listing URLs to start crawling from. The scraper will automatically find more links.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect.

maxPagesPerList.title: Maximum Pages per Category
maxPagesPerList.description: Maximum number of pages to visit per category to prevent excessive crawling.

maxConcurrency.title: Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of simultaneous requests. Lower values (2-3) are more stealthy, higher values (5-10) are faster.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to avoid blocking. Residential proxies recommended.
